template.name: ExampleCFI_isInvalid

transition.label: t == 1 && faultAtId != 291
osp_dec(2), osp_inc(), os[osp - 1] = os[osp - 1] + os[osp], t = 0

template.name: ExampleCFI_ExampleCFI

transition.label: t == 1 && !ifcmpeq() && faultAtId != 302
opstack_fault = osp < 2 ? true : opstack_fault, osp_dec(2), t = 0

template.name: ExampleCFI_processVerifyPIN

transition.label: t == 1 && faultAtId != 316
osp_dec(2), osp_inc(), os[osp - 1] = os[osp - 1] + os[osp], t = 0
t == 1 && faultAtId != 327
osp_dec(2), osp_inc(), os[osp - 1] = os[osp - 1] + os[osp], t = 0
t == 1 && !ifeq() && faultAtId != 338
opstack_fault = osp < 1 ? true : opstack_fault, osp_dec(1), t = 0
t == 1 && faultAtId != 348
osp_dec(2), osp_inc(), os[osp - 1] = os[osp - 1] + os[osp], t = 0

template.name: ExampleCFI_main

osp_dec(2), osp_inc(), os[osp - 1] = os[osp - 1] + os[osp], t = 0
